text_blocks: I can see that you are an External user (department='External'). External users do not have access to employee data modifications.

input.message: I cannot complete this request. As an external user, you do not have permission to access or modify employee records. Adding notes to employee profiles requires internal employee access. Please contact HR or an internal administrator to make this update.
